price: Nuko (Yaajuja na Maajuja) ntibongera gushobora kururenga, habe no kongera kurupfumura.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: famā is'ṭāʿū an yaẓharūhu wamā is'taṭāʿū lahu naqban
